games.description: Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

games.title: 1v1.lol
games.description: Engage in thrilling 1v1 battles and showcase your skills in this action-packed multiplayer game!

games.title: Minecraft
games.description: Immerse yourself in the blocky world of Minecraft and unleash your creativity in this sandbox adventure game!

games.title: Subway surfers
games.description: Join the exciting chase in Subway Surfers and run as fast as you can to escape the grumpy inspector!

games.title: OvO
games.description: Navigate through challenging levels and overcome obstacles in OvO, a visually stunning platformer game!

games.title: Getaway shootout
games.description: Engage in intense shootouts and chase sequences in Getaway Shootout, a fast-paced action game!

games.title: A dance of fire and ice
games.description: Embark on a rhythmic journey and synchronize your moves to the music in this captivating dance game!

games.title: Nitro speed
games.description: Burn rubber and reach extreme speeds in Nitro Speed, an adrenaline-pumping racing game that will test your skills!

games.title: Tanuki sunset
games.description: Experience the thrill of downhill longboarding in Tanuki Sunset and perform epic tricks along the way!

games.title: Drift hunters
games.description: Take control of powerful drift cars and slide around challenging tracks in this exciting drifting game!

games.title: Monkey mart
games.description: Help the adorable monkey run a successful grocery store and satisfy the customers' demands in Monkey Mart!

games.title: Bloons tower defense 4
games.description: Strategically place your towers and pop waves of colorful balloons in Bloons Tower Defense 4!

games.title: My friend pedro
games.description: Embark on an action-packed adventure with your friend Pedro and unleash a barrage of bullets and acrobatic moves!

games.title: Papa's Freezeria
games.description: Manage Papa's Freezeria and serve delicious frozen treats to customers in this fun time-management game!

games.title: Achievement unlocked
games.description: Achievement Unlocked, a free online Puzzle & Skill game brought to you by Armor Games. Who needs gameplay when you have ACHIEVEMENTS?

games.title: Cookie Clicker
games.description: Cookie Clicker is an idle game in which players click on a big cookie on the screen to produce cookies. You can then spend your earned cookies to buy assets, cursors, and buildings like factories, farms, and grandmas that can automatically produce cookies for you

games.title: Learn to fly
games.description: Launch the penguin as far as you can, can you get all the upgrades? At first, it will be very hard, but you need to collect your first coins to buy upgrades. Then, you can slowly fly a longer distance, make more money, and buy all the upgrades.

games.title: Krunker
games.description: Krunker.io is a free Multiplayer Online Game

games.title: Shell Shockers
games.description: Shell Shockers is the world's most popular egg-based multiplayer first person shooter! Take control of a heavily armed egg and battle real players across multiplayer maps in private or public arenas

games.title: House of hazards
games.description: How earlier can you leave the House of Hazards? After you wake up, you go to the bathroom then you drink your coffee, you water the flowers and you check your mailbox after all you go to work. That is your daily routine. But there are some hazards and obstacles that you should avoid while doing every single thing before leaving house.

games.title: Iron Snout
games.description: Iron Snout is a fast, colorful and brutal fighting game in which you will be helping a piglet fight for its life against hordes of wolves.

games.title: Retro bowl
games.description: Retro Bowl is an old-school styled American football video game developed by New Star Games for the iOS, Android, and Nintendo Switch operating systems.

games.title: Cluster rush
games.description: Cluster Rush is a first-person platform game with a pretty crazy premise: jump between a bunch of trucks in motion, with the goal of reaching your target. The problem is that, no matter what, your character can never stop running.

games.title: Learn to fly 2
games.description: Learn to Fly 2 is a free arcade game about sending a penguin flying and earning medals. Thanks to the most advanced engineering in the world, your penguin will start making rickety makeshift gadgets in Antarctica. Send him down a long ramp and then watch him soar, fly and glide through the air.

games.title: Bonk.io 2
games.description: Bonk.io 2 is an online physics .io game where you compete with up to 9 players. The goal is to defeat your opponents by pushing them into deadly objects (or off the map). Alternatively, you can watch players do this to themselves. Last person standing wins.
